remarks: The coefficients of the fourier series are integrable and reals. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
fourierdlem16.f $e |- ( ph -> F : RR --> RR ) $.
fourierdlem16.c $e |- C = ( -u _pi (,) _pi ) $.
fourierdlem16.fibl $e |- ( ph -> ( F |` C ) e. L^1 ) $.
fourierdlem16.a $e |- A = ( n e. NN0 |-> ( S. C ( ( F ` x ) x. ( cos ` ( n x. x ) ) ) _d x / _pi ) ) $.
fourierdlem16.n $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN0 ) $.
fourierdlem16 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( ( A ` N ) e. RR /\ ( x e. C |-> ( F ` x ) ) e. L^1 ) /\ S. C ( ( F ` x ) x. ( cos ` ( N x. x ) ) ) _d x e. RR ) ) $.
$d C n x $.
$d F n x $.
$d N n x $.
$d n ph x $.
